name: Glitch Garden (Iconoclast209)
description:
This is a work in progress for a Udemy course I am taking.

 Select and place Defenders to protect your garden from the foxes and lizards.  The trophies generate stars which act as a currency.

Current Game Status:  Basic Functionality.  Five Levels.  Difficulty Slider is not wired up.

Thanks to Ben and the crew at GameDev.tv and the wondeful people that worked on the original Glitch game.  Visit www.glitchthegame.com for great public domain assets.
